evil mentions her birthday: Evil mentions her birthday, either her 1st or 2nd one, at any point during the stream
evil rejects ellie's idea: Evil outright rejects an idea Ellie has. Modifying an idea does not count as rejecting it
evil insults ellie: Evil insults Ellie at any point during the stream
evil threatens ellie: Evil insults Ellie at any point during the stream
evil mentions vedal unprompted: Evil mentions Vedal at any point, unprompted by chat, donations, or Ellie
evil mentions neuro unprompted: Evil mentions Neuro at any point, unprompted by chat, donations, or Ellie
evil swears: Evil swears. Low-level swears such as dumbass do count for this prompt
evil mentions harpoons: Evil mentions harpoons at any point during the stream
evil is ungrateful: Evil is ungrateful for anything during the stream. This includes the work Ellie is putting in for her robot body, her new model, her birthday, etc
evil is wholesome: Evil is wholesome at any point during the stream
evil makes a poll: Evil makes a poll at any point during the stream
evil threatens world domination: Evil threatens to take over the world at any point during the stream
